title: Elegant Diamond Cut Bangle - Kanganam Design
materials: 22K Gold Bangle with meticulously cut diamonds. The gold boasts a rich Hyderabadi polish
enhancing its luster. The diamonds are of SI clarity with H color
features: This modern bangle features a sleek, minimalist design. The bangle incorporates diamond clusters set along the band, separated by gold rhombus shaped segments. This design is an updated approach to the traditional solid gold kanganam.
colors: Classic gold and bright white sparkle from the diamonds create a striking contrast
perfect for those seeking both elegance and sophistication.
occasions: Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions. Its refined design makes it suitable for both traditional events like Deepavali as well as more contemporary gatherings.
description: This bangle presents a fresh, modern take on a classic South Indian design. Its unique design elements and comfortable wear make it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine, while the diamonds add a touch of luxury.
